news.title: Google Ads Intros Automated Insights, Performance Max Campaigns, to Release Video Action Out of Beta
news.description: Google continues to move forward in its effort to use machine learning to serve campaigns across many of its properties as it responds to the exigencies of the COVID-19 pandemic.

news.title: Google My Business Adds More COVID-19 Health & Safety Checks
news.description: Additional health and safety attributes that have been integrated into the GMB local listings include safety dividers at checkout and a policy of disinfecting surfaces between visits.

news.title: Google Introduces Song Matching via Singing, Humming, or Whistling
news.description: A new Google feature will allow people to identify a song through the app or widget by tapping the microphone, asking to search a song, and then humming, whistling, or singing the song.

news.title: Google My Business to Log Recent Customer Calls
news.description: A new feature in Google My Business will allow businesses to see recent customer calls that were triggered by search results, although it remains in an early stage of development.
